mapper.insert:
select seq_study_num.nextval from dual
insert into tb_study(name, email, category_code, address_code, num ) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{categoryCode}, #{addressCode}, #{num})
insert into tb_participant(num, email, condition, study_num ) values (seq_participant_num.nextval, #{email}, #{condition}, #{studyNum})
mapper.select: select a.*, nvl(b.FILE_GROUP_CODE,1) as file_group_code from tb_study a left outer join tb_study_recruitment b on a.num = b.study_num inner join tb_participant c on c.study_num = a.num where c.CONDITION = 2 and c.email = #{email} order by c.PART_DATE
mapper.delete: delete from tb_participant where email = #{email} and study_num = #{studyNum}
mapper.update: update tb_participant set condition = 2 where email = #{email} and study_num = #{studyNum}
mapper.select: select score , count(*) over(partition by SCORE) as cnt, count(*) over() as total, round(count(*) over(partition by SCORE) / count(*) over() *100,0) as percent, round(avg(SCORE) over(),1) as avg from tb_review_user where email = #{email} order by score
mapper.insert: insert into tb_review_user (score, num, email, email_recom ) values (#{score}, #{num}, #{email}, #{emailRecom})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_review_user where num = #{num} and email = #{email} and email_recom = #{emailRecom}

select num, study_no, content, to_char(start_date,'yyyymmdd') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'yyyymmdd') as end_date, type, font_color,bar_color ,title from TB_CALENER where STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} and start_date < to_date(#{stend},'YYYYMMDD') and end_date > to_date(#{ststart},'YYYYMMDD') order by end_date - start_date desc
select email,num, study_no, content, to_char(start_date,'yyyymmdd') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'yyyymmdd') as end_date, type, font_color,bar_color ,title from TB_CALENER where num = #{num}
mapper.update: update TB_CALENER set content = #{content}, start_date = to_date(#{startDate},'YYYYMMDD'), end_date = to_date(#{endDate},'YYYYMMDD'), type = #{type}, font_color = #{fontColor}, bar_color = #{barColor}, title = #{title} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select a.name, a.email, b.category_name as category, c.address_detail || ' ' || address_detail2 as address, d.cnt as member, a.reg_date as regDate, nvl(e.chk,1) as chk from tb_study a inner join tb_category b on a.category_code = b.category_code inner join tb_address c on a.address_code = c.address_code inner join (select distinct study_num, count(*) over() as cnt from tb_participant where study_num = #{num}) d on a.num = d.study_num left outer join (select count(*) over() as chk, study_num from tb_study_recruitment where study_num = #{num}) e on a.num = e.study_num
